venue.name: Manchester City Library - Main Branch, Winchell Room

item.description:
EVERY HUMAN HAS THE POTENTIAL FOR GREATNESS

To Discover and Realize Your (Greatness) means Self-Empowerment.

 "Positive Thinking Makes you Great".

 

To Celebrate one needs to feel Happy and in Control, isn't it? For that, power and happiness is required. Never too late! Make Your-Self Powerful and Happy through the Method of Positive Thinking. Your Mind is always there for you. It is ready to create new and positive thoughts, it is your friend. Work with it, take it's Cooperation and become a creator of your own Greatness. Humans are meant to Live a Great Life and to Celebrate in True Happiness. 

This Workshop will cover: Activating Your Unlimited Potential,

  • Understanding the Function of your Mind, and Intellect (Thinking Tools).
  • Transforming weakness into powers through positive thinking,
  •  Changing Attitudes and Emotions from Negative to Positive.
  •  Celebrating the Wealth of Unlimited Positive Energy hidden within.

group.name: Owning Greatness Through Raja Yoga Manchester Meetup Group

item.name: Human Greatness Via Self-Empowerment and Positive Thinking II
